articles.description: Pep Guardiola's Manchester City may have been knocked out, but his influence can still be felt in the Champions League semi-finals, says Guillem Balague.

articles.title: Cleveland Cavaliers thrash Miami Heat to win NBA play-off series 4-0

articles.description: Adam Johnson died after suffering a neck injury from a skate during a collision in a match.
